JioMart, Reliance's online-to-offline commerce platform that launched in May, has scaled up rapidly, riding on the pandemic-fuelled digital acceleration.

articles.title: Jeff Bezos’s former wife MacKenzie Scott donates over $4 billion in four months - The Indian Express
articles.description: Scott’s gifts this year approach $6 billion, which “has to be one of the biggest annual distributions by a living individual” to working charities, according to Melissa Berman, chief executive officer of Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors.
